name: TLPS Collectible Poster
description: TLPS marks the first partner exhibition on glry.xyz. In cooperation with Lydian Stater we present 16 works by 11 artists new to NFTs. The exhibition will run on glry.xyz/tlps from June 3 to July 9, 2021. This collectible poster is one of 3 to commemorate the event. Buyers of this poster during the exhibition period will get a warm thank you and link to their account from our site. Design by Joseph Wilcox.
